commands.name: uptime-monitors
commands.title: Uptime Monitors
commands.description: Get Uptime Monitors and their details

commands.name: blacklist-monitors
commands.title: Blacklist Monitors
commands.description: Get Blacklist Monitors and their details

commands.name: contact-lists
commands.title: Contact Lists
commands.description: Get Contact Lists and their details

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
